Puss the Cat:
Meow! Good to see you, meow! I am Puss the Cat! I am a faithful servant of Taoist Daema, Ahuron Raulian meow! My master is Ahuron Raulian - one of the top ten masters in the Ivory Tower.
Recently, the Great Big Squash Event! was chosen the best event in your life, so I have been dispatched here with my master's permission, meow!
Our Puss brothers will carry out the Great Big Squash Event!, where we hand out squash seeds to those who bring nectar, meow!
